abstract: National Museum of African American History and Culture faces criticism from several of Bill Cosby's accusers for not mentioning recent sexual assault allegations in upcoming exhibit on Cosby's contributions to comedy and television.

headline.print_headline: Cosby Exhibition Draws Criticism From Accusers
headline.main: Museum’s Plan to Include Cosby Material Draws Criticism From Accusers

keywords.value: National Museum of African American History and Culture
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Several women say that the National Museum of African American History and Culture should not take note of the comedian’s career unless it also mentions their sexual-assault accusations.
lead_paragraph: Several women say that the National Museum of African American History and Culture should not take note of the comedian’s career unless it also mentions their sexual-assault accusations.
